cdib.config.colorlist.description:
A list of colors that smoothly transition according to item durability. 
These colors define the gradient of the durability bar.
cdib.config.twinklingdurabilitycolor.des: The color used for the flicker effect when the item's durability reaches the critical threshold.
cdib.config.durabilitytwinkling.descript: If enabled, the durability bar will flicker when the item is at critical durability
cdib.config.durabilitybarincreaseoncriti:
If enabled, the durability bar temporarily rises to full length while at critical durability. 
Meanwhile when durability is not critical, bar will reduce faster (not durability).
cdib.config.criticalpercent.description: The percentage of durability at which the item is considered to be in a critical state.
cdib.config.durabilitytwinklingspeed.des: Controls how fast the durability bar flickers at critical durability.
cdib.config.durabilitybarstyle.descripti:
Defines how the durability bar is displayed. 
Horizontal - Vanilla style.
Vertical - Vertical bar at left side of item, decreasing from top to bottom.
Percent - Displays durabiltiy as a percentage
Absolute - Displays the remaining durability as a raw value, using short scales (1.0k,1.0m,1.0b),when needed.
cdib.config.bundlebarcolor.description: The color used for bar the non-full bundle.
cdib.config.fullbundlebarcolor.descripti: The color used for the bar of full bundle.
cdib.config.colorlist.name: Durability Colors
cdib.config.durabilitytwinkling.name: Flickering Durability
cdib.config.criticalpercent.name: Critical Percent
cdib.config.durabilitybarstyle.name: Durability Bar Style
cdib.config.bundlebarcolor.name: Bundle Bar Color
cdib.config.fullbundlebarcolor.name: Full Bundle Bar Color
cidb.config.uniqueitemcolorlist.name: Unique Item Color List
cidb.config.uniqueitemcolorlist.desc: An item map with color lists. If an item is on the map, its durability bar will use colors attached to item in map instead of the default ones.
